meta.job_title: Lead, Technology Investments Planning and Management

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and manage technology capital asset lifecycle investments.
Evaluate new technology capital investments resource requests.
Research and recommend alternatives to promote cost-efficiency.
Develop, maintain, and support programs to replace obsolete IT and OT assets.
Responsible for the total cost of ownership (TCO) modeling process.
Develop, formulate, and recommend capital and reimbursable budget funding scenarios.
Implement and maintain a reimbursables & show-back methodology to provide transparency to the costs incurred and value provided by the IT Department.
Provide the IT Department’s input and assessment of the technology components of annual capital budgets and expenses.
Oversee and manage on-time technology obsolescence.
Proactively manage and plan for contracts and supplier engagements.
Forecast one-time and recurring resource requirements and secure funding and staff for new IT initiatives.
Ensure appropriate budget approvals and funding is established for key IT initiatives.
Coordinate with HR on new headcount approvals and changes.
Identify and approve funding for new IT projects and initiatives.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Finance, Accounting, Technology or similar field. MBA, or master’s degree preferred.
